paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.demographics: Patient MC18 (age 40, male), Patient MC24 (age not specified)

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with type 2 LQTS, experienced multiple syncope episodes, and resuscitated sudden cardiac arrest.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: This patient had a likely pathogenic variant in KCNH2 (c.2453C>T) which is compatible with a diagnosis of type 2 LQTS.
KCNH2 variants were found in two patients, with a different nucleotide substitution in the same codon that resulted in a different amino acid; patient MC24 with p.S818W.

functional_data.summary: The KCNH2 variants are associated with long QT syndrome.

variants.evidence_level: likely pathogenic based on ACMG criteria
variants.additional_notes: Both patients with KCNH2 variants were affected with long QT syndrome.
key_quotes: KCNH2 variants were found in two patients, with a different nucleotide substitution in the same codon that resulted in a different amino acid.
